content.detailedDescription:
Driving in sw oklahoma, very clear morning - no clouds, and i looked out my driver's window and saw an object flying relatively low in the sky. it appeared completely flat, no tail, no wings and possibly a silver color. as i was driving i continued to watch it; it stayed ahead of me at somewhat an even speed, but faster than i was driving. i would also add it was approximately 1/2 mile to 1 mile in distance from me, but with no obstructions - sw oklahoma is very flat, so i could see it very plainly.
i actually pulled over to the shoulder to continue to watch the object, and then saw it just stop (hovered), right in the sky, for approximately 4-5 seconds, and then shot up in a 90 degree angle, so fast it was gone. this was not crop duster, no helicopter, and i did ask a relative who is an air force retiree, still an active pilot, if he knew of anything that could just stop and "hover", and then fly straight up so fast, then be gone. to his knowledge he knew of nothing. 
my feelings and reactions were only of awe and surprise. i've never seen anything just stop mid-air, shoot up, and then disappear. i was also interested in the shape - no tail, no wings, etc. 
though this happened several years ago, i still wonder about it; have meant to report it several times, and still wonder what it might have been.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Object flying low, then hovering to a stop, then shooting up 90 deg. and gone

content.detailedDescription: Me and my mother was standing out on our porch when we seen this light coming over the mountain coming from the north towards the south straight towards my house then my mom said for me to get my binoculars out to get a good look at this because it had no flashing lights unlike a plain what i seen was no air craft and when i pointed the binoculars at this object it stopped in mid air as if it had seen me i got a good look at it and let me tell you people this object is nothing that we have it's the design is like something ancient just the formation in shape is unbelievable that's how good of a view we have been seeing these objects here just about every night just in the past 3 months they rang in different colors and shapes i never seen so many ufo's just in this short period of time as we are seeing over shamokin. my friend sam from ohio is seeing these objects coming up out of the lake on a steady basis and he contacts me by email and phone and when he says they are headed north towards my way i see the same thing that he is seeing off the lake like 10 min later sam has come to shamokin 2 weekends ago to spend the night and when we sat out in the yard we both seen the same thing the object i seen last night was a bright light that dims and becomes bright
content.summary: This object was strange in shape

content.detailedDescription:
I had arrived at work and parked when i looked through the front windshield of my vehicle to the east and saw a bright point of orange/white light at approx. 30/45 degrees above the horizon, more or less eye level for a driver.  i sat there and looked at it, believing it to be an aircraft reflecting the light of the setting sun behind me in the west, or a glare on the windshield, but i easily ruled out glare simply because the sun had set behind the horizion and the parkinglot lights had not yet turned on.  i thought that it had to be a plane or a helicopter.

it initially began as a single exceptionally bright point of light, perhaps half as large as a dime held at arms length and very bright orange/white, much like an incandecent lightbulb.  i saw that it was moving in an east to west direction directly towards me.  thinking it was a plane i left my vehicle and prepared to head into work, though after retriving several items from the cab of my truck i again looked at the object and saw that it was still moving east to west, now much closer -60 to 70 degrees above the horizon.

the formerly bright light had dimmed considerably, it's size decreasing to half what i had initially seen it.  i thought this odd since a plane heading into the sun would have continued to maintain a constant or increasing glare/reflection, rather than decreasing.  i stopped and watched the object at this unusual development.  i cannot honestly say when the object changed from a brignt point, i was looking around the parking lot to see if anyone else was observing it.  i looked back up and the object was almost directly overhead, the single point of light was now a clearly defined set of four, much like a triangle, with the upper point being the direction of travel, and two lights set on either side joining the point.  the sky was overcast, and i cannot be sure just what the altitude was, but i could not decern any mass within the lights, and the formation's size was about the same as a quarter held at arm's length.

i looked at my watch and around me once again to see if anyone else was looking, and when i returned my gaze to the sky, the object had vanished.  i could not see anything that may have caused a reflection, such as an aircraft flying in a westerly course.  i have seen many planes flying over this area, this object did not exibit any similarity to the craft i have normaly seen.  and i can say with absolute certainty that there was nothing visible within the area bracketed by the four lights.  i observed the object for apporximately fifteen minutes and it did not vary it's course or speed in any way during that time.  i cannot say that i felt any kind of confusion or overwhelming emotion when i saw this, for the most part until i saw the four lights in place of the single sphere i considered it to be a plane.
content.summary: Orb/chevron shaped lights

content.detailedDescription:
I had stepped out of my back door into my garden to have a cigerette before i went to bed, and immediately noticed a low pitched undulating sound... quite audible but not loud. this did not sound like a plane/helicopter/ or a car of any sort. i couldn't work out which direction it was coming from.

i started to look around the sky for a couple of minutes but couldn't see anything, the sound disappeared, approximately 30 seconds after it disappeared it started again. now i could still not see anything that was making this noise. i was facing the back tree in my garden when at a 2 oclock angle from my tree a light shot by quite high up in the sky about 2 inches and disappear, the sound stopped. now usually when i see a light pass by in the sky at that speed i think shooting star. but this was way too big i would say roughly the size of a one pence piece if held arm-stretch away towards the sky. the fact that the sound disappeared shortly afterwards is also a little bit too coincidental in my books.

i came back outside a couple of times for a few minutes after 2am to see if the sound would come back but it didn't. however i did notice that a star sized object was moving in the sky at a rapid speed, and shortly thereafter another star sized object was moving almost on the same path in the opposite direction. whether these were planes at high altitude i don't know but they were moving pretty fast. 

unfortunately i have no hard evidence, but that is what i saw.

details of the night: high visibility/no clouds/warm/very light wind.
content.summary: A strange undulating low frequency sound + light

content.detailedDescription: Five people viewed a sighting at an eastlake residence on the lake erie shore. the object went up and down gradually and was a large sphere  1" - 1 1/4" in diameter as seen from the observation point.  at one point it went higher than the moon and dissipated.  the object did not travel horizontally.  on this night the moon was waxing and lake erie was calm. no boats were seen.  caller, a teacher, was 15 feet above husband who was fishing on shore with 2 1/2 year old child.   caller thought it was a cargo ship and didn't pay attention to it for a few minutes.  object was white, with pinkish green colors on the bottom. husband saw something entirely different. a tunnel effect, like smoke or and columns and didn't see lights but a cloud, a pole at ground level that went straight up to the moon. n one knew  what created the swirling effect seen by husband.  caller thought object was 50 miles out .  there was a screech sound about 10 minutes after the sighting. it was not their baby who was asleep.  it may have been another baby, although the godmother of that child did not hear a screech and was nearer than the other witnesses to the second baby.   this bothered the caller, but the caller is not discounting one of the babies made the noise.  sphere was observed  for 8-10 minutes.  caller doesn���t know how many times it went up and down. weather was clear, dark. nothing else happened. no other effects except goose bumps.
content.summary: Object over lake erie

content.detailedDescription:
I have seen an event in the same patch of sky and filed a report earlier this month. almost every night since then,from 9:30 to about 11 pm, i've been outside to check i haven't seen the 6 or 7 seta of lights in my initial report, but i have seen a set of 1 or 2. there seems to be one in the place almost nightly where the largest one from my first report was. unable to make out shape, but is a multi-colored (red, green, blue, white) blinking object, hovering in the distance of the ssw allentown sky. if i use my imagination, i think it's over the limerick nuclear facility, which has the airport next to it. none of my research indicates that either one of those facilities has any multi-colored blinking lights anywhere, all are standard red-white.Have looked at info on satellites too, nope, it's not a satellite.

am using a binocular and a weak cheap telescope to verify.Have had family members outside to witness also.

am filing this report because of similar sightings in pa being reported. clearly (thankfully!) i am not the only one seeing it.I am stumped, i have no clue what it/they are.
content.summary: Blinking colored lights visible in ssw sky from allentown pa re-occuring

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my friends front yard after riding bikes the summer of 1985 and turned to walk home when i saw a flash of light, like a spotlight passing on the tree tops closest to the road where i was walking. i looked up and saw a hoovering disc shining the light around the hill all around us. my friend went to tell his dad while me and another friend stood and continued to observe the movement of the spotlight and the disc's movements arcross the sky. 
  when his dad returned he couldn't explain to us what it was and made us go home and said we shouldn't talk about it for fear that some people may not beleive us if we told them what we were seeing. i stood for a half hour mesmorized by what happened next. a bright red glowing light lowered from underneath the bright white disc shape, much smaller in size, about 1/20 the size of the white disc. the red ball of light continued to lower untill it was behind some trees where the red light began to move from left to right scanning it seemed for 25 mins while the white disc shaped object hoovered above. the red glowing light then returned to the spot where it first went behind the trees and slowly raised back upwards untill it was inside the white disk shape again. the white disc glowing even brighter than before, slowly faded away and then was gone as if it flew away very fast. i have no drawings or photos but i could render some sketchs if needed. the images are still very clear what i saw that night.
content.shape: Disc,  Egg,  Fireball,  Oval,  Saturn-like,  Star-like
content.summary: Bright disc shape or oval with red ball of light dropping out from underneath

content.detailedDescription: Unidentified lights were seen around the time of 11:45pm july 29th, 2008 in mcgregor texas. the lights were bright and seemed to be appearing and disappearing at random points over the nearby hercules naval weapons plant where they produce and test solid rocket motors and missiles. the sighting was viewed by more than 30 people, all on a cigarette break at the convergys building in mcgregor. this same building use the belong to hercules before being purchased by dell computer and then taken over by the city of mcgregor.
content.summary: Unidentified pulsating objects

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my back patio having a cigarette and looking at stars when what i thought to be a shooting star flew through the sky from the south. the tail that it had faded out. it then slowed until the object seemed to be going at a steady high speed directly north. i called my friends from inside the house after the object changed direction suddenly and started heading due east. three other people also saw the object while it was heading to the east and seemed to fade away until it was no longer visible almost like the light was going out slowly. the object was very much star like in appearance besides the fact that it was a solid blue glow and had no twinkle like a normal star. needless to say we were all a little weirded out by it. in total from the time i first spotted it to the moment it faded away was a span of about two minutes.
content.summary: Star like object with solid glow flew over head from the south with a tail wich later disapeared.. also changed directions.

content.detailedDescription:
These event(s) were observed from july 21 through july 25 while driving home from work (zimmer in warsaw). while driving home(initial sighting) from work on state road 25 (south towards rochester), and about 4-5 miles out of warsaw and just past the devil's backbone (section of road with numerous s curves) caught a glimpse of several orange colored spheres (three of them) in no organized formation to the south of my location, roughly about 25 degree elevation above the horizon. observed no actual movement except that the spheres were lazily drifting about and in view roughly 10 - 20 seconds then as if someone turned off a switch they were gone. continue to observe the sky line while driving and about 5 miles down the road again observed again three orange spheres (close to the town of mentone)again as if someone turned on a switch. location this time to my orientation again about 25 degrees elevation but more to the south-west and again lasting about 20 seconds and then vanished. the second observation noted that 2 of the spheres were side to side of each other with the 3rd elevated above the other 2 at about 35 degrees elevation from horizon with a slow movement to the west then again vanished. after passing through mentone and about 3 mile from the intersection of sr 25 and sr 110 again observed the three orange spheres directly to west of my location in a single file formation again about 25 degrees elevation from the horizon but with a noticeable movement to the north. at this point lost sight of the spheres due to heavy tree line and change in driving orientation. these spheres were noted again the next four nights while driving home on the same road and about the same time for each of the following nights usually noted direction to the south - south west. distance from my point of view to the spheres, in a linear direction, guessed to be about 10 - 15 miles off. total time spheres observed was over a 20 minute time period for each of the five nights.

on all five nights that the spheres were noted, the weather was clear and no clouds noted in the sky, the sun was still noted just about setting to the west. also noted that there were stars just starting to come into view at the time of observing the spheres. (note these spheres were not stars or planets of any type or size as they were well defined spheres and had no wink effect as a star or planet would have viewing through the atmosphere). also made note that they were no other aircraft observed to be in the air at the time, because i made an attempt to recognize and look for any form of the typical red/green running lights that aircraft have their wings and noted no bright white light that would be on the tail of an aircraft either. also observed no contrail, exhaust or wake near or around the spheres.

at first thought the lights might of been flares set off by a military aircraft(the type of flares used when heat seeking missiles are fire at them, to try to divert the missile, plus the location to the south is grissom afb)but these flares are of a very bright white in color and last for a duration as these were orange (like a pale colored pumpkin)and then just winked out and not just fade out like a flare would. unable to note any noise or sound from any form of propulsion as i was inside my car driving. these spheres were very similar to ones that i had noted about 3 years while out star gazing with my telescope except for that episode noted that there were four spheres in a formation, that of a trapazoid again noted to the south - south west and moving to west at about 3 - 5 mph.

my feelings at the time of the first sighting july 21, was exhilarating to see another ufo as i have seen many in the past. also brought back things that i had learned in a couple of night courses that i had taken at vincennes university 67 - 77 presented by j. sievers and k. tevorbough, and tried to follow the procedures that they discussed to document these type of sightings.
content.summary: Observed numerous groups of 3 spheres in the sky over 5 nights

content.detailedDescription:
While out getting my mail tonight i looked up to see some sort of object floating by overhead up in the sky. it is a very clear night with no clouds, little to no wind, and no moon.

i thought it was a blimp or advertising balloon but then it started rotating on an axis and those things don't do that, nor did i see any navigation lights on this object. plus its rate of movement was more on the order of a small plane or helicopter rather than blimp.

the object was very dim in the sky but i could make out some sort of pattern of very dim lights  or somesuch on its surface. i've seen advertising banners like this so i still think it might be that since the pattern on the object looked very much like what you would see on a goodyear blimp (which i've seen numerous times at night), but the object was much longer, more like a towed banner.

time was 9:40pm, location fair oaks & highway 101, direction the object was moving at a steady rate s-se (the general direction of the wind), speed unknown but being so dim it left my visibility in about 1 minute when it moved near our complex's tennis court lights.

apparent size was about the width of 2 or 3 fingers overhead (unfortunately i didn't have the presence of mind to do this while viewing the object). altitude unknown but not low. no noise.
content.summary: Dim object with some sort of light pattern sighted moving overhead at night

content.detailedDescription:
Flying from san jose to lax on sunday july 27, 2008 i had a forward window seat (3a) on the port (left) side of the american eagle aircraft and as we were descending in a southerly direction my attention was caught by a high speed white object below the horizon, flying past in the opposite (ie. northerly) direction at our level (maybe 5-7,000 ft). visibility was clear and it was only minutes before sunset. we were over land and flying fairly level. i first assumed the object must be very distant as i could not make out the shape, then immediately realized that its shape was spherical and that it was close, only a few hundred yards away. estimate object size at 6-8 feet in diameter, off-white reflective color, no illumination visible. had it in sight for 5-6 seconds until it went behind the wing of my aircraft. it maintained a constant speed and constant altitude and left no contrail. as i lost sight of the sphere it seemed a little orange which was probably a reflection of the setting sun.
just minutes later we banked to the right for our final landing approach into lax, landing to the north.
it was not a balloon. it did not rise and its high speed means it was powered, not stationary. i fly a lot and have often watched traffic flying past in the opposite direction so am familiar with apparent closing speeds.

interested if any other reports were made in the los angeles area around this time.

warren p aston
mufon member.
content.summary: Small high speed white daylight sphere

content.detailedDescription: Looking up i noticed a lighted sphere-like object that flashed a blinding white light only, every 3 seconds silently streaming across the sky, after a long hot day i wanted to cool off outside my home, the stars were out bright.  i was standing outside my back door looking up to the east direction the lit up object was cruising south to north.  i noticed it because the stars were so bright and none were moving only this one and fast. i thought the object was a satellite but then it flashed this bright light that looked amazingly bright for any plane i have ever seen. i watched this thing for 10 seconds then it just disappeared from my view and usually i notice you can track a plane all the way across the sky,there was something about it that was so different,from your ordinary object that you would see in the sky.  i am 37 and sky watch alot since i live in a very small town not much lights here on reservation land.  i was speechless as i ran in the house to tell my husband and sister, shaky andin disbelief of what just transpired outside my home in the air.
content.summary: Looking up i saw awhite spherelike lit up object way up with a blinding flashing white light

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking in the town of olympia wa going to a birthday party with my friend/roommate and expecting to arrive at about 9 pm. we noticed a saucer shaped craft, bluish in color with a dome top, hovering over a tree nearby (difficult to judge distance). it was slightly tilted to the right. i do not remember what caused us to notice it. i think i pointed it out to him. we watched it for what seemed like 15 to 30 seconds. we watched the lights of the craft (there were three in an upsidedown triangle shape) change positions with each other a few times. it then slowly moved upwards and to my right and then it shot off at a 2:00 direction and disappeared. it was completely silent. i said to my friend. "what was that?" and he said, "i don't know." on some level i was certain it was a ufo but it was as if i didn't really care. this is strange to me. we never spoke of it after that night. we went to a party and i soon realized it was a party in full swing. i was very confused because i expected to be one of the first guests but instead there were many people there, food and drink already consumed, and people saying to us "oh you made it" ect. i looked at a clock and noticed it was between about 11 pm (somewhere between 11 and 11:20 pm). i mentioned to my friend/roommate "do you know it's 11:00?" and he said in a surprised manner, "yeah, i know." we had "lost" about two hours.

i subsequently became very psychically intuned and believe that they gave me a certain cosmic type consciousness. i have not seen them sense that time.
content.summary: I saw a small craft hovering by a tree with no sound. it had three lights in the shape of an upsidedown triangle. the lights changed position. we watched for about 30 seconds then it moved slowly to the  right, shot off at a 2:00 direction, and vanished

content.detailedDescription:
[i originally submitted this report to mufon shortly after the event when it was freshest in my mind so as to maintain the clearest account for reference, but am unable to find it in your report database.]

on saturday, 2/17/07, i exited the golf course where i play just after sunset. at that time of year, it would have been close to 5pm. as i drove out the exit road, i noted, when the road made a turn to nw, a strange silhouette approaching at speed from the southwest. i at first thougt it some type of raptor, like a red-tailed hawk, but the shape was not right and the course was too straight. it was unusual enough to continue to engage my full attention. i stopped the car and dropped the window while i continued to watch this strange-looking airborne object still in silhouette. i then quickly made a turn to the west at the intersection to improve my angle and stopped the car again to watch this object continue to approach from the sw. the object exhibited no strobe lights at all which are customary on domestic aircraft, and now at this new angle the object was no longer in silhouette and was much nearer now. 
i am not an engineer, but i know enough to recognize that the known laws of physics say this aircraft should not have been in the air. there was nothing aerodynamic about its shape at all. two metallic spheres were placed opposite the other behind the mid-point of the central section of the craft that i can only call the "fuselage". the spheres were a burnished copper color, with a black line running around their equators. from my viewing angle, the rear of craft was obscured by the spheres. the "fuselage" itself, as much as i could see of it, was shaped like a shuttlecraft as featured on the "star trek" series, with a downard sloping nose. i can only guess the altitude of it, not knowing its actual size, but i would estimate it at not more than 1500 feet. and it was totally silent as it passed just to the south of my vantage point...It made no noise at all, not even the rush of air being split. it then appeared to bank a little left, and disappeared out of sight over the hills and pines to the north behind me. the total time it engaged me was 2 to 3 minutes.
i have never seen anything like it, before or since. i was breathlessly stunned and awed. i hurried home to call the pd and the newspaper to see if any reports witnessing this had been made, as the course the object was on would have taken it right over the main part of the city of redding. there were no other reports even though the craft was low and the sky was clear. i know what i saw and am still stunned by it.
content.summary: Witnessed an unaerodynamically shaped craft without lights fly silently into and out of view.

content.detailedDescription:
For the past 4 weeks, beginning july 2 (when i first noticed) and every night (except 2 or 3 nights of lightning and thunder) one disc shaped
approximately in same spot give or take 20 feet either way, hoovering
to my left (looking out my window) just above trees i can see it is disc shape with white round lights all around, and at the same time to my right
more higher in sky a more triangle shaped with red, green & white lights just hoovering in sky, no noise.  every night only after 9:30 pm est and i check most nightly at 10pm, 11pm, 1am and i got up at 3am and still there, just hoovering.  only at night after 9:30pm do i first see them.
one night a couple of days ago, the sky seemed to have more plane and helicopter traffic it looked like either a small plane or helicopter was getting closer to get a look at it and suddenly the plane veered off to the right, my guess that they saw what i've been seeing.  then the triangle shaped one disappeared, or turned off the lights, then when the planes went away about 30 minutes later the red, green & white lights came back on and it was in the same spot.  some nights there are 3, same one on the left, disc shape white circle lights all around, then one little one farther center, then the triangle shaped one on the right. (triangle formation). 5 to 6 hours (or more) every night. just hoovering.
even on nights with no stars, there they are.  when the stars are out, there they are. a family member who lives 5-6 miles away also can see
2 objects in the sky one on left and one on right.  on one night their dog was barking and whinning at the window, when they looked out the window they saw the objects in the sky. (i saw them, my other family members were called to look and they saw what i saw). 
i don't ever recall seeing these when i looked out the window at night before july 2008.  about 2 or 3 days ago, was the only time i seen them
in a different spot in the night sky.  (i looked out the window on another side of my house).  like they are just waiting or just watching.
i tried to take a digital picture it showed up on camera but when i looked at the picture on my computer there wasn't nothing there, but night sky. i called a family member to see it on the camera too. 
after seeing it there for just about 1 month, i still don't know what to think.  one with just white lights, and one with red, green & white lights. no one seems too concerned about this, people wrote to the local newspaper but that's about it.  i didn't think levittown, pa had anything that interesting to be watching.  if they want people to see them why can't they be seen in the day time.  they don't seem to be hiding at night.  don't know if i would want them to come any closer anyway.
today is july 29th,2008.  getting close to 9:00pm. almost time to look.
content.summary: Two sets of 2 different lighted hoovering objects in sky at night

content.detailedDescription: Friday 25th from 10:00 pm observed to the 26th about 12:30 am. loooking toward the south noticed very bright light - brighter than sirius would have been - no where near canis major, not a planet - not on the plane for planets. stationary with slow movements - no movement with sky just a little to the west. i am a amateur astronomer and have scads of telescopes - nexstar, ultima 11-inchers sct's but just couldn't get it all set up in time so observed with a pair of meade binoculars. noticed something out of place in sky immediately as i look up every night. four lights changing to three sometimes two, sometimes one. sometimes in v shape (have photos of v shape of lights) turned on edge and looked like a saucer with lights on edge (see photograph if it uploads to you) - very strange markings (bumps) on sides of disc and lights on edge. something shot out of grouping of four and i caught in on film (see photo if i was sucessful in uploading to you). object thrown out looked like a sphere not brightly lit. also something smaller or further away?? to the west and a shooting, very fast object just below polaris stopped abruptly to the north - 3 objects total but one in south more significant than the others. wife and son saw all of this as well - got them out in the yard. have been trying to debunk - no shuttle, no iss in my area during these sightings according to my research - have at least 40 photos most not very good. used a sony cyber shot with a 10x zoom - tried different settings. what did i think? - thought it was cool, very sleepy the next day! was not scared just fixated as it continued to change shape and could be seen to do so with the naked eye. working on sketches.
content.summary: Changing shape in the south from 4 lights to less, something shot out of cluster of 4 - turned on edge looked like saucer - lights mostly in a v formation

content.detailedDescription:
My name is rudy, i would like to report a triangular/ delta ufo

i was driving from nc fayetteville to daytona beach fl, and about 10:00 pm july 28, 2008 , i was 17 miles north of jacksonville fl. on  highway i-95, when i saw this strange flying object hovering over the highway, i was driving about 70 mph when i saw this object hovering on the highway at first moment i though that it was a helicopter giving tickets from the air , so i reduced the speed at to 60 mph, (300 feet horizontal distance and about 50 to 80 feet vertical altitude ) but when i  got closer  to the object  then  i realized that it was not a helicopter (at that moment i was about 70 feet horizontal distance and 50 feet to 80 feet vertical altitude) then the ufo starting  to move to my left side (90 degrees from driver seat) at the point i was thinking that it was a small airplane because i did not set the rotors but the object was moving to slow, about 10 mph, and did not have beacon lights, nor red or green lights like airplanes , it did not have the shape of an airplane nor the sound, it was silence because i rolled down my window and i heard only the engine of my car ,  it had triangular delta shape 3 white lights one in each corner of the triangle shape(underneath), color was metallic gray the borders were rounded and it appear to have like layers of metal , object size about 35 feet long , the lights were about  30 inches . when i noticed and realized that was not an airplane nor helicopter i pulled over the side of the highway and i got out of my car at this moment the object it was about 300 feet and at the same altitude but about my 6 o'clock and them it when over the trees about my 5 o'clock and it disappeared between the trees. this happened within 2 a 3 minutes time frame,  after i arrived to daytona beach and told my friend what happened and i described and him the object , after that we went to the internet looking for ufo shapes and we founded the shape.  

i am pilot with ( 190 hours) private pilot licenses and working with on my  instrument rating and i pretty much i can distinguish  airplanes and ularhelicopters at night and i had been in service (us army)  for more than 8 years and i had never seen something like that in my life (military nor civilian aviation)

i always believed that  extraterrestrial life existed but i had never i  was so close to see one ........Rudy
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Ufo triangular / delta

content.detailedDescription: Whilst sat in the garden i was looking up at the sky.��� i then noticed a bright white light moving in the sky.��� at first i thought it was a plane but there were no green and red lights flashing as you would expect. all there was was a bright white light moving from west to east towards bedford area. its speed was at a regular speed. i look for any aother activity in the sky and noticed planes in the sky with there green and red lights flashing which made myself more suspicious.��� then the white light just seemed to turn off???��� told my family about it and was then told that there had been several sightings with the same discription.
content.summary: Bright white light with no other lights flashing. moving west to east at a regular speed

content.detailedDescription:
The following is copy of my observations of a july 5th, 2003 sighting in eagle river, wisc. even though 5 years removed, the event is just as clear and vivid to me today as if it just happened. my eyesight is excellent and is confirmed at 20/12. upon furlther analysis of that day the "silver object" was less than a 1/4 mile away and ~ 200 ft. above the trees. i relive this event in my mind every time i walk out on my dock...

it was late afternoon and as i was putting the cover on my boat i looked up into the sky and i noticed an extremely shiny (silver/metallic) cigar-shaped object traveling in an east to west direction. the object traveled at a very slow rate of speed and at a constant velocity. there was absolutely no sound that emanated from the object. there was no con-trail, no wings, no windows, no lights or anything of discernible nature that would suggest that this was an aircraft or balloon. the object seemed to reflect the bright sun off the surface, but then i noticed that a vertical band of light started to appear from the front of the object and traveled slowly to the back of the object. this band of light appeared every 15 seconds or so and traveled over the surface of the object (from the front to rear). the object did not change speed, hover or change direction at all. i observed the object for about 2 minutes and tracked it until it went out of sight over the tree line. the weather conditions at the time of the sighting was absolutely clear. my impression is that the object was relatively small, maybe the size of a small plane, and that the altitude of the object was ~1000ft. i truly have never seen anything like it in my life... i hope that someone else had seen this object, taken video or pictures and can confirm this sighting... i am truly blown-away at what i saw and can't stop thinking about the event...

update:

additional recalled observations that eventful afternoon: 

ps. also, when i viewed the object, the rear hemi-spherical end was "out of focus" the appearance was like as if you could take a picture of the cigar-shaped object in sharp resolution, but the back portion (and probably the front) was simply "blurred" . my instinct is telling me that this object has a tremendous gravitational field running thru the axis of the object and that reflected light is being bent... only a guess... also, as the vertical band of light traveled over the surface of the object (imagine the light emanating on a perpendicular line from the surface of the object) as the light traveled to the back of the object (on the curved rear surface) all of a sudden i saw a prism of multi-colored light hit me (similar as if you accidentally glanced into one of the laser scanners in a food store). finally, the surface of the object was shiny but not polished. again, similar to a semi-gloss (silver colored) ceramic substance... sorry for not conveying this information the first time, but since i still constantly think about this event, i wanted to put down everything i saw that eventful afternoon... 

one of my repeating fascinations with this event was seeing with my own eyes the "out of focus" hemi-spherical ends of the object. if i was actually viewing "gravitational lensing" in a near field environment, this might give a clue as to a kind of propulsion system certain types of crafts like these possess. another observation that i failed to report was that the large band of white light that appeared on the surface of the craft had a smaller band of white that trailed the larger one. (there was no "mirror image" of the smaller white light band on both sides of the larger light band, only that the smaller light band trailed the larger band and was smaller in width...

question: " has others reported similar observations of "out of focus" sections of craft/objects???" 

to answer the mufon questions:

1)  something (in my mind) told me to turn around and look up into the sky.  i actually started to walk up the stairs to my cabin, but i stopped dead in my tracks and turned around to see this incredible object!

2)the object was in clear sight and the afternoon was perfectly clear and still (minimal wind (if any)).  everything was extremely still, but i did hear the sound of crickets.

***  the very interesting thing i recall now was that there was nobody on the lake (not anybody in screaming distance to call to) to observe the object.  this alone is somewhat unique in that at that time of day usually there are numerous fishermen, boats, swimmers, people on their docks.  i purposely looked around all the docks on our small bay and i was alone with that 'object'.

3)i immediately thought the object was a ufo and that i was observing something that was not of this planet.

4)my first reaction was to run up the stairs and get my wife to observe, but i felt that if this was going to be my only time in life to observe a craft like this i would "turn on" all my observational skills and intently take it all in (in real time).  i purposely turned away from the 'object' for a few seconds and then looked back at the craft to see if i was not dreaming and every time the 'object' had moved to the position i thought it would be in...  just further along its vector trajectory path.

5) to say i was excited would be an understatement as you can imagine, but the event was so "incredible" i have relived it thousands of times over and over in my mind.  i can't stop thinking about this event for some reason...

i have tried to convey everything that occured those 2 minutes in my life and i hope that some individuals can relate to the profound impact that an event like this has on a persons life...
content.summary: Daylight observation of cigar shaped (pill) - wisc.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down bear lake dr.,during one of those lightning storms,the ones with the sun blaring on very dark clouds...Loking up at the violent clouds and lightning there looked to be a split in the atmoshere.Straight as a arrow,as far as i could see..North to south...No clouds...Just black...Like i could see into outer space.However,i could not see any stars through this split? so it looked like it could be a solid object...But showed no edges or anything.I could see it had no end to the length...5 miles...50 miles..Circle the earth? 10 to 15 cars pulled over to just stare at the object.Now if it was a rare weather sight,would'nt it be looking angled a little,and not able to hold these swirling storm clouds at bay,until 15 minutes later,when the clouds did slowly fill it in...Or did the black thing raise up and leave?I told another man standing there:maybe the old man is coming down.He said:maybe...My heart was pounding wondering what was happening,is this the end?All the people were relieved when the clouds slowly filled it in,and left.I wish i got the others who stopped,because it acted like a solid object...Not a perfectly split sky and atmosphere....
content.summary: Black...5-25 miles long...Straight across the sky

content.detailedDescription:
10:15 p.M. dark sky ,hazy no stars .Walking dog on top of low cliffs in westerly direction.Dog looked up and i saw almost circular red/orange object with dotted lights extending in a fan shape above circle.Approaching land from north at small aircraft speed.No sound.Looked about 1,000 up but that is a guess.Extended arm and made a fist. sighted object which appeared to fill space between  two knuckles.
approaching land it slowed and turned due west ,fan lights went out and it accelerated at fighter jet speed or more .Approx angle of ascent 30 degrees from horizontal.Faded to pin point and disappeared.
wind was from east ,only force 2 to 3.
i saw 4 people ahead of me and hurried to catch up.They saw exactly the same phenomenon as myself but spotted it earlier than me when "it was coming directly at us at very high speed.It slowed as it approached land"
they had thought, as i had it was a hot air baloon illuminated by the "burner".But it flew at 90 degrees to the light wind and ascended at a speed which would shred a baloon.
i live on heathrow and gatwick flightpaths with a military base nearby so am familiar with aircraft and helicopters in all weather conditions.
was it a weather baloon or dirigible? no - too fast.
an unmanned drone .Possible but why illuminate a military craft?
a laser light show.That was all that happened.Usually they go on for very much longer.
lastly "ball lightning ". i have read of this but have no experience.
later at 3:45 a.M. a small storm of lightning and thunder occurred but lasted only half an hour or so.
i reported the occurrence to a local paper but they had no other reports.
as an interested amateur astronomer i was very interested.No meteor or other such phenomenon would perform in the observed manner.The perseids are not prolific until later in the month.
any similar reports.?
i came home and talked to some friends who told me they had seen a very similar thing in northern france two weeks ago but it was much nearer and appeared to fill the width of a narrow lane they were walking down.One described my "fan" shape as like the shape of a shell petrol logo.
content.summary: Object approached coast from seaward (north) circular orange/red with fan shaped smaller lights above main circle..No sound.At landfall turned sharp west , ascended at considerable speed.

content.detailedDescription:
It was aprox 10;20 pm on the 24th of july 2008 when my dog barked at something outside, when i went out i could not see anything until a bright star like light was stationary above . at first i thought it was a star but it began moving to the left. slowly at first and then it would vary its speed by increasing its speed in small bursts then slowing again 
it was totally silent and did not carry any flashing beacons and continued on its course in an arc. it also seemed to cross in front of a approaching airliner which was landing at the local airport, (4 miles away) 
i have no explanation as to what i saw but 3 days later 200 sightings have been reported in the uk.I unfortunatly never had the idea of photographing the object and seemed gone before i knew it
content.summary: Bright white ball of light.

content.detailedDescription: This happened a very long time ago.  i know it happened sometime in the early seventies, up to 1977, i really don't remember which year.  i was travelling with my then husband in a pick-up truck ging south to key west.  he was driving, i was the passenger.  it was daylight, a clear day, about 1 pm.  as we were coming off one of the numerous bridge spans in the keys, to my right, above a residence on a key, on the gulf side, bordering the gulf, half on top of the house and half on top of the water, i could not help but notice a huge metallic object hanging there in the sky, very close to the house and water, just hovering, probably 3/4 of it enshrouded in clouds.  the part i could see below the cloud cover looked like the bottom part of a missile, or the tail of a blimp, but it was upright.  this is the only part i could see.  it was huge. stationary. i rolled down my window to get a better look.  there was absolutely no sound to it,and i was close enough that i should have been able to hear something of that size if it was generating any noise.  lots of people were pulled over on the side of the road looking up at it, pointing, but my husband was terrified, and despite my begging, he would not pull over and just floored it away from there.  i was so excited, something i'd never seen before, i thought it was a ufo.  i looked back as we were driving away, and it just vanished.  i remember checking all the papers on the rest of our trip, but never could find any report about it.  i never reported it.  but all i know is that the rest of the trip i only looked toward the skies.  in recent years, i've checked on the computer to see if i could find a reporting of this, but i've had no luck.
content.summary: Metallic object seen hovering partly over residence and gulf of mexico, no sound

content.detailedDescription: First i want to say that i am open minded but don't believe whole heartedly in ufos or the paranormal. both sightings were very close to each other. the first one i was resting out very late at night, close to an old school i knew from childhood. i lay my head up against a mound of dirt and grass, the playground to my right. looking up at the sky littered with stars i saw an object that was moving. this object was small and moving in many different directions as if it were a living being. it changed shape, became elongated wove in and out of clouds. this could have easily been something explainable i suppose...A meteor or comet entering the earths protective layer...Or maybe just my eyes playing tricks, but they usually don't. the next sighting i saw while i was sitting outside of my house. there i sat in a white lawn chair, looking up at the sky i saw an object move and stop move and stop, also lights beneath and to the sides and bottom of the object were noticable but strangely so. what i'm trying to say is that there were very faint things like blurbs of light going on beside the object. were these sightings not from this earth? i don't know, i find it unlikely though that human beings having been on this earth for such a long time that now all of a sudden we're starting to provoke a greater frequency of sightings. or perhaps it's something the government is doing...Yes i believe that is more likely. sorry no photos digital cameras are too expensive :(
content.summary: Two ufo sightings over eugene, oregon

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my back porch late monday evening, and early into tuesday, when i noticed something moving across the sky that appeared unusual. i noticed planes and are easily identified, but this one stuck out. the colors were spectacular, so i continued to watch it. there was a row or strobing red lights that were very definitively ball shaped on both sides. the belly had a row of white lights that was in the shape of a "v" pattern. the exact shape was hard to describe, because the the strobe was very distracting. when i first noticed it, i thought that it might be a satellite, then it stopped moving, went backwards, then continued at an incredible rate of speed. it did this several times. 

it startled me, and it did not know how to react. i was a little scared to be honest. i have never seen anything like this. i had stood up to go back into the house when i noticed it had stopped again. then it took off faster than anything i have ever seen, and disappeared out of sight behind trees.
content.summary: Saw an object with rows of red lights and a row of white lights in a "v" shape on belly

content.detailedDescription: At approx. 6:00 sat. afternoon, i noticed an unusual jet-engine sound from albany airport.I thought that a commercial plane might be taking off in a different direction because of the storm. at 6:30, as the sound continued, i looked out my south facing bathroom window, and saw 2 f-15 eagles flying in formation directly over my house. they made two passes, and after they flew by the second time, i happened to see at the top of the cloud, the cigar shaped object. it was the same color as the cloud top- an ivory white color,and was devoid of any wings or tail control surfaces. i couldn't see any portholes, but it clearly was not a commercial airliiner. it was moving due south, and i lost sight of it as it went back into the clouds. i called several tv news stations, and channel 10 said that they had received numerous calls about the fighters, but i was the only one who saw the object. channel 10 was also told the the jets were conducting "training excercises". i asked the person if he really thought that the air force would be conducting training excercises in commercial airspace like that. the obvious answer is no- the usaf was scrambled up there!! also, i guess it just a matter of time until  i saw the "mother ship", as there have been numerous personal sightings of various objects in the latham area. wilton makes latham look like o'hare by comparison!!
content.summary: Cigar-shaped object at top of storm cloud

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to the beach from philadelphia to dewey beach del and stopped for gas at a bp station right off route 1 above dover.  i was just taking a few shots of my dog in a wheat field behind the station because the sky and colors were so vivid and made a perfect picture.  i returned home a day later and never really looked at the pictures.  in fact, i moved the file several times before ever looking at these pictures and that is why the time and date are now a little vague to me.  so about 2 weeks ago i finally looked at the pictures on my computer and now i can see a shape to the left of the moon that is clearly something unidentifiable.  i will send two pictures to you so you can see in the second that it was not a spot on the lens as is is not there a couple of seconds later.
content.summary: This was only caught by my camera ...

content.detailedDescription:
I was out in front of my house putting things in my car getting ready to go to work.  i looked up at the sky, between the house and the church, to see if it was cloudy or clear.  it was cloudy.  saw the two flashes of light going in a west north west direction.  first thought was a firefly but i don't think they fly that high and that fast or in a very straight line.  next thought was an aircraft but the distance and speed between the flashes appeared too fast and too far apart for any airplane that may be in the area.  (no more fighter jets at the air guard base in sioux city.)  also, there was no noise associated with the flashes of light.  finally, i thought maybe a shooting star.  do shooting stars flash multiple times?  not sure.  do shooting stars appear under cloud cover?  probably.  i did see a shooting star earlier in the week, but it was a clear night and the shooting star was a nice bright streak that fragmented at the end.  what i saw last night was two flashes that appeared quickly in a straight line.  i lost sight of whatever it was as it went over my house.
i know this doesn't seem like much of a sighting, but it did get me thinking.  what was the air traffic like in the area at that time?  why wasn't there any noise?  how fast was it going?  was it truly a ufo or something mundane?
i would like to know if anyone else saw this as well.
content.summary: Two rapid flashes in a row in a straight line going wnw.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside on my front porch having a cigarette when i looked up and saw a dome shaped object with green and red flashing lights hovering and moving slightly side-to-side in the far distance of the lower southern sky.  i grabbed my binoculars and took a better look... and it was definitely something not of this earth.
content.summary: Dome shaped with green and red flashing lights...
